alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mission Bay to near Coral Springs to near Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Sunrise, Boca Raton, Tamarac, Margate, Coconut Creek, Parkland, Mission Bay, Godfrey Road, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Whisper Walk, Boca Del Mar, Loxahatchee NWR, Boca West, Hillsboro Pines, Ramblewood East, South County Regional Park, Sandalfoot Cove and Hillsboro Ranches. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
